questions.q1: How long does the certification process take?
questions.a1: The certification process typically takes 4-6 weeks from application to final certification, depending on the complexity of your business operations and your readiness for inspection.
questions.a2: Certification fees vary based on the size and type of your business. Please contact us for a customized quote.
questions.q3: How long is the certificate valid?
questions.a3: Halal certificates are valid for one year from the date of issue, after which renewal is required.
questions.q4: Do you certify businesses outside the country?
questions.a4: Yes, we offer international certification services. Contact us for more information about international inspections and requirements.
